typeparam.span: 泛型型別的基礎實值型別。

span.span: The underlying value type of the generic type.

summary.span: Represents a value type that can be assigned .

span.span: Represents a value type that can be assigned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 型別稱為可為 null，則它可以指派的值可以指派`null`，這表示型別沒有任何值。A type is said to be nullable if it can be assigned a value or can be assigned `null`, which means the type has no value whatsoever. 根據預設，所有必須參考型別，例如，可為 null，但所有實值類型，例如，不是。By default, all reference types, such as , are nullable, but all value types, such as , are not. 在 C# 和 Visual Basic，您將標示為可為 null 的實值類型使用`?`之後實值類型的表示法。In C# and Visual Basic, you mark a value type as nullable by using the `?` notation after the value type. 例如，`int?`在 C# 或`Integer?`在 Visual Basic 中宣告的整數值類型，可以指派`null`。For example, `int?` in C# or `Integer?` in Visual Basic declares an integer value type that can be assigned `null`. 結構支援使用只有實值類型做為可為 null 的類型，因為參考型別可為 null 所設計。The structure supports using only a value type as a nullable type because reference types are nullable by design. 類別提供互補的支援結構。The class provides complementary support for the structure. 類別支援取得基礎類型可為 null 的型別，並對其基礎實值型別可為 null 類型的比較和等號比較運算不支援泛型比較和等號比較作業。The class supports obtaining the underlying type of a nullable type, and comparison and equality operations on pairs of nullable types whose underlying value type does not support generic comparison and equality operations. ## 基本內容Fundamental Properties 兩個基本成員結構和屬性。The two fundamental members of the structure are the and properties. 如果屬性物件是`true`，可以使用存取之物件的值屬性。If the property for a object is `true`, the value of the object can be accessed with the property. 如果屬性是`false`，物件的值會是未定義並嘗試存取屬性會擲回。If the property is `false`, the value of the object is undefined and an attempt to access the property throws an . ## Boxing 和 UnboxingBoxing and Unboxing 可為 null 的型別會進行 boxed 處理，當 common language runtime 自動方塊的基礎值物件，不物件本身。When a nullable type is boxed, the common language runtime automatically boxes the underlying value of the object, not the object itself. 也就是說，如果屬性是`true`，內容屬性會進行 boxed 處理。That is, if the property is `true`, the contents of the property is boxed. 可為 null 型別的基礎值 unboxed 時，建立新的 common language runtime結構初始化為基礎的值。When the underlying value of a nullable type is unboxed, the common language runtime creates a new structure initialized to the underlying value. 如果`HasValue`屬性可為 null 的類型是`false`，boxing 作業的結果是`null`。If the `HasValue` property of a nullable type is `false`, the result of a boxing operation is `null`. 因此，如果 boxed null 的型別傳遞至預期的物件引數的方法，該方法必須準備好處理的情況下引數`null`。Consequently, if a boxed nullable type is passed to a method that expects an object argument, that method must be prepared to handle the case where the argument is `null`. 當`null`是進行 unboxed 處理成可為 null 的型別，通用語言執行平台建立新結構，並初始化其`HasValue`屬性`false`。When `null` is unboxed into a nullable type, the common language runtime creates a new structure and initializes its `HasValue` property to `false`. ## [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)] 和 Windows 執行階段元件 and Windows Runtime Components 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)]，您可以包含類型作為成員的 WinMD 程式庫中匯出的結構。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v451](~/includes/net-v451-md.md)], you can include a type as a member of a structure exported in a WinMD library. 先前，這不支援。Previously, this was not supported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會定義 Microsoft Pubs 範例資料庫中資料表的三個資料列。The following code example defines three rows of a table in the Microsoft Pubs sample database. 此資料表包含兩個不可以是 null 的資料行和兩個資料行可為 null。The table contains two columns that are not nullable and two columns that are nullable. [!code-cpp[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cpp/tarow.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/cs/tarow.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.nullableOfT.class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.nullableOfT.class/vb/tarow.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性的目前結構是`true`和`other`引數不是`null`，等號比較由傳遞`other`參數`Equals`方法基礎值的目前結構。If the property of the current structure is `true` and the `other` argument is not `null`, equality is determined by passing the `other` parameter to the `Equals` method of the underlying value of the current structure. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會判斷物件是否和物件是否等於目前物件。The following code example determines whether an object and a object are equal to the current object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果型別的值`T`尚未指派給物件，您可以比較以`null`並擷取其屬性，但是您無法存取其屬性或呼叫其他成員。If a value of type `T` has not been assigned to the object, you can compare it to `null` and retrieve its property, but you cannot access its property or call its other members. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性`Nullable`物件，以判斷它是否應顯示物件的屬性或其屬性。The following example uses the property of a `Nullable` object to determine whether it should display the object's property or its property.
